channel.title: Lucknow News, Latest Lucknow News, Lucknow News Today and Headlines | Hindustan Times
channel.description: Lucknow News - Find latest Lucknow news and Headlines based from Lucknow City. Also check out latest news belongs to Lucknow crime, Lucknow education news, Lucknow real estate, Lucknow politics and more at Hindustan Times.

image.title: Lucknow News, Latest Lucknow News, Lucknow News Today and Headlines | Hindustan Times

item.title: Hoardings showcase UP’s religious, tourist destinations before G20 guests
item.description: These hoardings are part of the government plan to hard sell UP as an investment destination before the visitors from abroad.

item.title: A woman can be prosecuted for gang rape: HC
item.description: Elaborating the provisions of IPC sections 375 and 376 related to the offence of rape (amended in 2013), Justice Shekhar Kumar Yadav rejected the plea that a woman cannot be prosecuted for the alleged commission of the offence of gang rape

item.title: This GITA uses AI to solve life issues!
item.description: Seeking solution to life problems?Welcome then to modern GITA guidance, one that uses artificial intelligence

item.title: Govt wants to ensure no section left behind, says President Droupadi Murmu in Lucknow
item.description: President Droupadi Murmu distributes forest rights letters to members of Buxa tribe on the second day of her visit to Lucknow

item.title: Valentine’s, a day to also celebrate furry friends
item.description: Valentine’s Day can be so much more than an opportunity to celebrate your significant other

item.title: Uttar Pradesh has used technology to give digital platform to investors: Yogi Adityanath at G20 Digital Economy Working Group meeting in Lucknow
item.description: Digitalising PDS helped Uttar Pradesh save ₹1,200 crore annually, says chief minister Yogi Adityanath at G20 Digital Economy Working Group meeting in Lucknow

item.title: Uttar Pradesh gets its first mediation & arbitration centre
item.description: Facility aims to aid government, investors; reduce time taken to enforce contracts and resolve disputes

item.title: AIR-Prayagraj to launch Kumbhvani station for Mahakumbh
item.description: For this, a separate transmitter will be installed at the Sangam area to broadcast several programmes throughout the day, starting at 5.15 am each day, officials said.

item.title: ‘KGMU planning to introduce robotic surgery’
item.description: For speedy recovery of patients, the department of surgery at the King George’s Medical University is planning to introduce robotic surgery, said Prof AA Sonkar, HoD surgery at KGMU while addressing a press conference here on Monday.

item.title: Religious cities too catch investors’ attention at UPGIS
item.description: Religious cities of the state also attracted investors in the recently concluded Uttar Pradesh Global Investors’ Summit (UPGIS) in Lucknow

item.title: Dr Ambedkar is like God to me: President Murmu at BBAU convocation
item.description: Total 253 gold medals, 3,808 degrees awarded at the 10th convocation of Babasaheb Bhimrao Ambedkar University (BBAU), Lucknow

item.title: Gorakhpur attracts investment of ₹1.71 L crore at UPGIS
item.description: Giving this information, the CM camp office at Gorakhnath Temple on Monday said it will generate jobs for around 1.98 lakh unemployed people

item.title: Ease passport verification for students: U.P. Madrasa Board writes to MEA
item.description: According to board chief Dr Iftekhar Ahmad, around 35 to 40 applications from the passport department seeking to verify marksheets issued by the board are received daily

item.title: President Droupadi Murmu visits Varanasi, offers prayers at Kal Bhairav, Kashi Vishwanath temples, witnesses Ganga aarti
item.description: President Droupadi Murmu, who arrived in Varanasi from Lucknow, was accompanied by governor Anandiben Patel and chief minister Yogi Adityanath

item.title: Two women burnt alive during demolition drive in Kanpur Dehat
item.description: Hundreds of villagers resort to brick-batting and force admn teams to beat hasty retreat. Senior officers reach Madauli village where a heavy contingent of police has been deployed due to simmering tension

item.title: Finnish firm to take over waste management in major UP cities
item.description: The company will invest around $2 million on waste management in the state and may also set up a new waste disposal plant in Lucknow. AVS Group looks after the firm’s operations in India, says LMC official

item.title: Angry truck driver drags car on highway in Meerut, arrested
item.description: The incident took place on Sunday night around 9pm on the Delhi-Hapur bypass road close to Shopprix Mall in Uttar Pradesh

item.title: Over 50 events light up ‘Manfest Varchasva’ after three-year break at IIM Lucknow
item.description: The fest saw more than 30,000 participants in 50-plus events across 3 days in offline mode after three years.

item.title: From start-ups to postal services, stalls at GIS had something for all
item.description: The several stalls set up at the Global Investors’ Summit venue covered a wide range of fields and needs, engaging all kinds of visitors

item.title: President Droupadi Murmu says Uttar Pradesh’s holy places focal point of India’s spiritual strength
item.description: Our President symbolises ‘women power’, says Uttar Pradesh governor Anandiben Patel, CM Yogi Adityanath congratulates Droupadi Murmu on behalf of ‘25 crore people of state’

item.title: U.P. govt failed to come up with new projects in 6 years: Akhilesh
item.description: In a statement, the SP chief alleged that the BJP dispensation showcased those projects which were implemented by the previous Samajwadi Party government

item.title: FTAs will open up market access, help U.P.’s wineries: Piyush Goyal
item.description: There are many countries where people want to taste Indian wine and liquor, said the Union commerce and industry minister

item.title: Take advantage of U.P.’s new warehouse policy: Anupriya Patel to investors
item.description: The Union MoS for commerce and industry underscored need for reduction in logistics cost at Global Investors’ Summit (GIS) 2023 in Lucknow

item.title: UP Global Investors Summit: UK to invest in defence, aerospace and medical sectors in Uttar Pradesh
item.description: United Kingdom ready to commit to a historic partnership with India with largest ever transfer of jet engine technology, says British minister Alex Chalk at UP Global Investors Summit

item.title: President Droupadi Murmu hails Uttar Pradesh’s growth as Global Investors Summit ends with ₹33.5 lakh crore tally
item.description: Valedictory session of UP Global Investors Summit: President Droupadi Murmu says Uttar Pradesh first in many areas of economic contribution, investment flow will create lakhs of jobs

item.title: UP Global Investors Summit: Yogi Adityanath says groups of ministers, senior officers to implement MoUs
item.description: Yogi Adityanath said Uttar Pradesh got the benefit of the respect that Prime Minister Narendra Modi has earned for India in the past nine years

item.title: U.P.: Brother-sister duo to escort Prez to stage at BBAU convocation
item.description: Shubham and Kriti Rai have been tasked with escorting President Droupadi Murmu to the dais when she arrives at Babasaheb Bhimrao Ambedkar University as chief guest for the university’s 10th convocation on February 13.

item.title: UP Global Investors Summit: Investment proposals have potential to help remove regional disparities
item.description: A district-wise break of the investment proposals received indicates that Gautam Buddha Nagar received investment proposals of ₹7.85 lakh crore (27.14% of total investment) followed by Agra with investment proposals of ₹2.18 lakh crore (7.54% of total investment), Lucknow with investment of ₹1.96 lakh crore (6.79%)

item.title: Cities transforming India’s economy: Puri
item.description: Addressing the session on ‘Re-imagining Cities as Growth Centres for New Uttar Pradesh’ on the last day of the Uttar Pradesh Global Investors’ Summit, Union minister minister Hardeep Singh Puri recalled his old association with Lucknow and said: “I continue to visit the city every second or third month. The previous government had little interest in implementing the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana, which was launched by the Central government in June 2015. Only 17,000 homes could be built under the programme in 17 months, in the largest state in the nation.”

item.title: U.P. has potential to attract global cinema: Thakur
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi had identified cinema and sports as soft powers. Both had power to bring glory to India at the international level, said Anurag Singh Thakur, Union minister for sports, youth affairs and information and broadcasting, during the session on ‘Media and Entertainment: The Indian Digital Growth Story’ session at the UP GIS-2023.
